name: Hooligan Vasja: Christmas
detailed_description:
This is the third episode of Hooligan Vasja's adventures.

Christmas is a joyful holiday. Children are sledding and making snowmen. Parents prepare the best gifts for their children. But evil does not sleep. At Christmas time, the most dangerous creatures awaken to steal gifts and ruin the holiday. What could be worse?

Hooligan Vasja is turning to the good side more and more with each new adventure. In the past he annoyed his neighbors with his antics but now he is about to clash with forces of evil to return the gifts and bring back the holiday. Our hero wears a Christmas hat and is armed with snowballs because only he can defeat the villains. Fight against evil and bring back the holiday to children, after all, hooligan Vasja has a good heart.
